name: VR Explosive Bow Hunt
description:
HD Oculus Quest2-Linked /Airlink and Oculus Rift  PCVR:

-8 levels to explore

-Hunt over 25 animals with explosive arrows

- Over 2.5 square miles

-Castles, islands, forests, dynamic weather and snow  in various levels

- Tree climbing in various levels

- Free demo 90 second level limit

- Still bug testing :) .... sometimes hands glitch when holding objects during level changes. Will launch full version once resolved

- I am a solo Indie Hobby Developer

- My other VR game for Quest2 standalone game link for an urban adventure game 10 miles to explore and animals to save, itch link and also app lab below, includes a free demo

Quest2 Standalone Urban Adventure
